column4: when I logout of my x-session, I see an error box pop-up but don't catch it fast enough. Hoe can I see what it is?
if it goes away, you don't have to worry about it, the system took care of it.
right, but it has a check box not to show it again. I'd like to check it off but can't mouse over to it in time.
understood, umm, you need to practice sniping with your mouse? :)
